abstract: Novak Djokovic receives favorable draw for Wimbledon, with former champions Roger Federer, Andy Murray and Rafeal Nadal grouped together in bottom half; Serena Williams receives difficult draw in which she will have to triumph over her sister Venus as well as Victoria Azarenka and Maria Sharapova to reach final.
lead_paragraph: Djokovic’s half of the draw does not include Roger Federer, Andy Murray or Rafael Nadal. On the women’s side, Serena Williams may have to get past three former No. 1s.

headline.main: Novak Djokovic Avoids Rest of ‘Big Four’ in Wimbledon Draw
headline.print_headline: Fortunate Draw for Djokovic; Williams Faces Difficult Path to Final

snippet: Djokovic’s half of the draw does not include Roger Federer, Andy Murray or Rafael Nadal. On the women’s side, Serena Williams may have to get past three former No. 1s.
